statements.select: SELECT * from (SELECT ROWNUM RN,t.* FROM (select ofd.orderfileheaderid,ofd.orderfiledetailid,ofd.barcode,decode(ofd.status,'1','上传成功','上传失败') as status , ofd.reason,ofd.createdate,tt.dictlabid,tt.dictcustormer,tt.enterby,tt.labname,tt.customername,tt.username, ofd.realname,ofd.mobile,ofd.idnumber from orderfiledetail ofd left join (select ofh.orderfileheaderid,ofh.dictlabid,ofh.dictcustormer,ofh.enterby,lab.labname,cus.customername,us.username from orderfileheader ofh left join dictlab lab on ofh.dictlabid=lab.dictlabid left join dictcustomer cus on ofh.dictcustormer=cus.dictcustomerid left join dictuser us on ofh.enterby=us.dictuserid)tt on ofd.orderfileheaderid=tt.orderfileheaderid where 1=1 and tt.Orderfileheaderid=$Orderfileheaderid$ order by ofd.createdate desc)t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN > = $pageStart$
SELECT Count(*) FROM orderfiledetail d where 1=1 and d.Orderfileheaderid=$Orderfileheaderid$ order by d.createdate desc
